## Toolbox.intersection() method

Return an intersection of 2 arrays

**Signature:**

```typescript
static intersection<T1 = any, T2 = any>(arr1: T1[], arr2: T2[]): any[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arr1 | T1\[\] | The first array |
|  arr2 | T2\[\] | The second one |

**Returns:**

any\[\]
